qwen3-4b-instruct.name: Qwen3-VL-4B-Instruct
qwen3-4b-instruct.description: Fast, optimized for speed. Good for standard photography analysis.

qwen3-4b-thinking.name: Qwen3-VL-4B-Thinking
qwen3-4b-thinking.description: Shows step-by-step reasoning. Great for detailed analysis with visible thinking.

qwen3-8b-instruct.name: Qwen3-VL-8B-Instruct
qwen3-8b-instruct.description: Larger model, better quality than 4B. Fast.

qwen3-8b-thinking.name: Qwen3-VL-8B-Thinking
qwen3-8b-thinking.description: Largest model with reasoning. Best quality and visible thinking.

defaults.description: Default: Qwen3-VL-4B-Instruct with LoRA adapter for fast, good quality analysis
